materials.raw_text: B: 6 grams, Co: 20 grams, Mo: 1 gram, V: 2 grams

sourcing.instructions: B: Purchase from a chemical supply store; Co: Obtain from a metal supplier; Mo: Available at specialty alloy shops; V: Sourced from chemical distributors.

preparation.raw_text:

 4. Finally, incorporate V and mix until uniform consistency is achieved.
